name: Move an email to a specific Gmail folder if the sender's email address is found in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
In this template, Make will be looking for senders' email addresses in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet and if it finds a match, it will move the email to a specific Gmail folder.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygQ3YJnn626GROruV?e=B3LnqG).
